remarks: The value of the "edge function" of a graph is a set containing two elements (the vertices the corresponding edge is connecting), analogous to ~ umgrale .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Aug-2017.)
statement: usgraedg2 $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ X e. dom E ) -> ( # ` ( E ` X ) ) = 2 ) $.
